sense.gloss: staging post on a highway (in pre-modern Japan)
counter for railway stations and bus stations
(train) station attendant, station employee, station staff
boxed lunch bought at a station (often a local specialty)
sexual position in which one person stands supporting the other
station area, in front of a station, (at a) station
local train, train that stops at every station
train that stops at every station, local train
station at which the train does not stop
railway station built with government and popular support
connecting station, station where you change
delivery of freight to a station
station vendor, selling (newspapers, etc.) at a train station, item sold at a train station

r_ele.r: きゅうこうていしゃえき

sense.gloss: studying at a language school near a station (instead of going abroad)
roadside station (government-designated rest area found along roads and highways)
